page.title: 08Housing 4 And 5
page.content:
{Maple Road Area The houses are aged between 45 and 60 years old and they are semi detached. The average number of years that the people we asked had been living there about 9 years.Three out of six of the houses we looked at were owner occupied,half of the people we questioned were born in this area.Four people expect to stay at the property for time to come.None of the houses in this area have tenants.
{Housing 5 { Claygate Lane Area Most people have been living here for quite a long time and most people were not born here.Most of the houses around this area were owner occupied.Most people thought that they would stay at this area for a long time to come.
